title: Marketing Campaign Effectiveness Survey
description: Help us evaluate the impact of our recent marketing campaign.

elements.name: campaignAwareness
elements.title: Are you aware of our recent marketing campaign?

elements.name: marketingChannels
elements.title: Through which channels did you see our marketing campaign? (Select all that apply)

elements.name: campaignAppeal
elements.title: How appealing did you find the campaign?

elements.name: brandRecall
elements.title: What is the main message you remember from the campaign?

elements.name: purchaseIntent
elements.title: How likely are you to purchase our product/service after seeing the campaign?

elements.name: brandPerception
elements.title: How has this campaign affected your perception of our brand?

elements.name: sharedCampaign
elements.title: Did you share any of our campaign content with others?

elements.name: competitorComparison
elements.title: How does this campaign compare to those of our competitors?

elements.name: callToActionEffectiveness
elements.title: How clear was the call-to-action in the campaign?

elements.name: campaignFeedback
elements.title: Please provide any additional feedback about the marketing campaign:
